chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
B: Type
p1: proc A
p12: proc B
s1: state
pp2: A -> Pred (proc B)

Goal:
p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> alwsafe s2 p) -> alwsafe s1 p12

Premises:
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc A
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc A -> (A -> Pred (proc B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc B)
Notation alwsafe s p := (always s p (fun=> xPredT))
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
UMC.p : forall (K : ordType) (V T : Type), UMC.class_of K V T -> pred K
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
alw_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type B : Type p1 : proc A p12 : proc B s1 : state pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B) |- Type] ?T' : [this : nid W : world A : Type B : Type p1 : proc A p12 : proc B s1 : state pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B) |- Type] ?f : [this : nid W : world A : Type B : Type p1 : proc A p12 : proc B s1 : state pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B) |- ?T ->...-> Pred (proc B) |- seq ?T]
alw_envsq : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p1 P -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
alwp_envsq : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p1 scs P -> always_sc s1 p1 scs (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
alwI : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always s p (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alw_envs : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_step : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
alwA : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always s p (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alw_ret : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
alwI' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
alw_act : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
alw_imp : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
alw_unfin : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_ret' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc B) (k : B -> proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_unfin' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always_sc s1 Unfinished scs P
alw_imp' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
alwA' : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe_sc s p scs -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s...
stepAct : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
